actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to prohibit any instrumentality of the United States from using as a prefix to the name of any person any title which indicates marital status, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits any instrumentality of the United States from using as a prefix to the name of any person any title which has the effect of indicating the marital status of that person.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit any instrumentality of the United States from using as a prefix to the name of any person any title which indicates marital status, and for other purposes.
